education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

career_summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 7+ years in full-stack development.
Specializes in C#, Azure Event Hubs, Angular, and RxJS.
Strong background in API design, RESTful services, authentication (OIDC, Azure AD), and real-time data using SignalR.
Experienced in Windows installer development using WiX Toolset and CI/CD integration.
Expertise in Azure services like Functions, Blob Storage, App Services, and Azure DevOps.
Skilled in frontend/backend automated testing: Jasmine, Karma, Cypress, Selenium, Appium.
Architects component-based systems for desktop and mobile using Ionic Framework and WinForms.
Chatbot development experience using Microsoft Bot Framework and LUIS.

responsibilities: Developed high-throughput C# agent processing 150k+ time-series events/sec.
Designed MSI/bundle installers using WiX Toolset with CI/CD automation.
Integrated Azure DevOps pipelines with digital signing via Azure Key Vault.
Built real-time monitoring using Azure Application Insights.
Reduced release time by 60% and incident response by 20%.
Supported 4 enterprise-level systems and reduced production issues by 40%.
Developed scalable apps in C# using Entity Framework with SQL Server.
Optimized database operations with stored procedures and triggers.
Built chatbot with Microsoft Bot Framework + LUIS for Skype integration.
Reduced Tier-1 support volume by 40% and response time by 60%.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

projects.title: Concrete Crack Detection using YOLOv3 and Mask R-CNN
projects.description: Developed a pipeline for detecting cracks using object detection (YOLOv3) and instance segmentation (Mask R-CNN). Visualized defect areas using bounding boxes and masks.

projects.title: Deep Audio Classification using CNNs
projects.description: Classified UrbanSound8K dataset using CNNs on Mel spectrograms. Achieved reliable performance with 10-fold cross-validation.

projects.title: Book Recommendation System using Opinion Mining
projects.description: Built an NLP-based recommendation engine using LDA topic modeling on reviews to improve recommendation quality.
